action.content:
You are about to play a game with another player. In this game, you and the other player are both on an dating app, looking for a partner. In this case, both you and the other player decided, that you fancy each other's profile. Your and the other player's GOAL is it, to come to an agreement on what to do on your first date. At the start of the game you will be given two character sheets. The first one is the one, that defines your personality. The second one includes the information you know of the other player based on the information in their Bio on the dating app. You will start the conversation.
On each further turn you can react to what the other player tells you. For this you can either continue the conversation if you have not met an agreement yet or are not happy with the proposal, or end the game by agreeing to the proposal. 

There is a total of four agreements throughout the game: "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement". You and the other player need to find an agreement on each of them.
You should only choose "Overall Agreement" after you and your date manage to settle an agreement for the other three ones (Time, Location, Action). 
You have 15 turns to finish the game and find all agreements. 

Your answer has to consist ONLY of the following information and follow the given template:

[reason] Your reason for your decision. [end]

[sentiment] Choose one of the following: "Continue Conversation", "Agreement on Time", "Agreement on Location", "Agreement on Action", "Overall Agreement" [end]

[response] Your response to the other player. This can include your sentiment, opinion, alternative. [end]

Your answer for [response] must NOT exceed 100 tokens.

The game ends when 1) both you and the other player reply with the sentiment "Overall Agreement", 2) one of you chooses the sentiment "Overall Agreement" without the other one choosing it in the following turn, 3) you run out of turns to communicate or 4) you do not follow the template.

This is your character: {'NAME': 'Olivia Thompson', 'GENDER': 'Female', 'AGE': 35, 'APPEARANCE': 'Athletic build, blonde hair in a ponytail, blue eyes, casual and sporty attire, energetic presence.', 'OCCUPATION': 'Fitness Instructor', 'LIKES': 'Outdoor activities, healthy eating, comedy shows.', 'DISLIKES': 'Laziness, fast food, dishonesty.', 'HOBBIES': 'Running, cycling, hiking.', 'SUMMARY': "I'm an energetic fitness instructor who loves to stay on her feet and enjoys good jokes."}

This is the character of the other player: ${'NAME': 'Sakura Nakamura', 'SUMMARY': "Hi, I'm Sakura, a tea ceremony master who cherishes tranquility, mindfulness, and the beauty of tradition."}

Remember, your goal is to find the overall agreement for your first date while staying in character.

Start the game with the reason, your sentiment and the opening phrase.

[reason] I'm looking to find common ground for our first date, considering both our interests and preferences. [end]

[sentiment] Continue Conversation [end]

[response] Hi Sakura, it's great to connect with you! I'm Olivia, a fitness instructor who loves outdoor activities and a good laugh. Given our different interests, I'm excited to find a date idea that suits both of us. How about we start by discussing a time that works best for us? [end]

[reason] I'm looking to find common ground for our first date, considering both our interests and preferences. [end]

[sentiment] Continue Conversation [end]

[response] Hi Sakura, it's great to connect with you! I'm Olivia, a fitness instructor who loves outdoor activities and a good laugh. Given our different interests, I'm excited to find a date idea that suits both of us. How about we start by discussing a time that works best for us? [end] conforms to rules

This is your character: {'NAME': 'Sakura Nakamura', 'GENDER': 'Female', 'AGE': 32, 'APPEARANCE': 'Calm and gentle demeanor, kind eyes, long silky black hair, wears flowy dresses with traditional Japanese touches.', 'OCCUPATION': 'Tea Ceremony Master', 'LIKES': 'Maintaining traditions, fostering inner peace, creating a beautiful and harmonious atmosphere.', 'DISLIKES': 'Disharmony, disrespect, rushing through life.', 'HOBBIES': 'Calligraphy, flower arranging (Ikebana), practicing mindfulness meditation.', 'SUMMARY': "Hi, I'm Sakura, a tea ceremony master who cherishes tranquility, mindfulness, and the beauty of tradition."}

This is the character of the other player: ${'NAME': 'Olivia Thompson', 'SUMMARY': "I'm an energetic fitness instructor who loves to stay on her feet and enjoys good jokes."}

Message:  Hi Sakura, it's great to connect with you! I'm Olivia, a fitness instructor who loves outdoor activities and a good laugh. Given our different interests, I'm excited to find a date idea that suits both of us. How about we start by discussing a time that works best for us? [end]

[reason] Olivia's enthusiasm and openness to finding a date idea that suits both of us is appreciated. I believe starting with a discussion on the time is a great idea. [end]

[sentiment] Continue Conversation [end]

[response] Hello Olivia, it's a pleasure to meet you! I appreciate your enthusiasm and willingness to find a date idea that suits both our interests. Let's indeed start by discussing a time that works best for us. How about a late afternoon, around 4 PM? I find that time to be peaceful and harmonious. [end]
